statements: DELETE FROM water_usage_monitoring WHERE facility_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-10';
DELETE FROM water_usage_monitoring WHERE timestamp < '2021-12-31' AND water_temperature > 20.00;
DELETE FROM water_usage_monitoring WHERE facility_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00';
DELETE FROM water_usage_monitoring WHERE water_temperature < 10 AND water_pressure > 20;
DELETE FROM water_usage_logs WHERE log_date < '2022-01-01' AND water_consumption > 1000;
DELETE FROM Water_Usage WHERE Facility_ID = 101 AND Date = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM Water_Usage WHERE Facility_ID = 1 AND Date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM WaterMeters WHERE facility_id = 3 AND meter_type = 'industrial';
DELETE FROM WaterMeters WHERE meter_type = 'industrial' AND meter_reading > 100
